main event: A civilian observed an elongated, soft yellow light in the sky over Vandalia, Ohio on September 8, 1961.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be traveling at a speed of 3,500 MPH., The observation lasted for 30 seconds., The object remained steady in size and intensity during the sighting., The object emitted no sound., The witness described the object as similar to a starlike object moving through the atmosphere.
